mapper.select: SELECT `cpp`.`id`,`cpp`.`problem_order`,`cpp`.`question`, (SELECT `cpt`.name FROM `checkpoint_type` `cpt` WHERE `cpp`.`checkpoint_type`=`cpt`.`id`) AS `checkpointType` FROM checkpoint_problem cpp WHERE `cpp`.`problem_order` = #{problemOrder} AND `cpp`.`checkpoint_id` = #{checkpointId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM checkpoint_problem WHERE `checkpoint_id` = #{checkpointId} AND `problem_order` = #{problemOrder} AND `answer` = #{problemAnswer}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM checkpoint_problem WHERE `checkpoint_id` = #{checkpointId} AND `problem_order` = #{orderId}

SELECT `cpp`.`id`,`cpp`.`problem_order`,`cpp`.`question`,`cpp`.`answer`, (SELECT `cpt`.name FROM `checkpoint_type` `cpt` WHERE `cpp`.`checkpoint_type`=`cpt`.`id`) AS `checkpointType` FROM checkpoint_problem cpp WHERE `cpp`.`problem_order` = #{problemOrder} AND `cpp`.`checkpoint_id` = #{checkpointId} ORDER BY `cpp`.`problem_order` ASC
